description:
Ataru and the gang discover there`s a planet of ice hidden in his closet, complete with it`s own queen! Though the jurassic excursion they take afterwards isn`t as lovely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aventure avec Neptune / L`époque confuse des dinosaures
Avventure su Nettuno - L`invidia degli uomini
Neptune Beyond the Closet / The Confusing Dinosaur Age
Oshiire no Mukou wa Kaiousei / Hachamecha Kyouryuusei Jidai
おし入れの 向うは海王星 - ハチャメチャ 恐竜時代
